column4: i'm not sure what you are trying to do, you could always "source ~/.profile" to get it to apply to the current shell (even though it may add redundant things to env variables)
what do you mean, 'may add redundant things lol'
I added two export lines and I just want to know how to update it without logging out and logging back in
i just mean if .profile has already added something to a path, 'source'ing it will add it again. I don't have any idea how to get it to apply globally without loggin in again.
